questions.question: How long has Brightlink been in business?
questions.answer: Brightlink has been providing high-quality LED display solutions for over 10 years, serving customers worldwide with cutting-edge technology and exceptional support.

questions.question: What makes Brightlink different from competitors?
questions.answer: We combine premium quality components with exceptional customer support, industry-leading warranties, and comprehensive installation services. Our Pro Spectrum line features advanced COB technology not found in competing products.

questions.question: Where is Brightlink located?
questions.answer: Brightlink operates globally with headquarters in the United States and showrooms in multiple locations where you can see our displays in action.

questions.question: Does Brightlink have a physical showroom?
questions.answer: Yes, we have showrooms where you can experience our LED displays firsthand and speak with our experts about your specific needs.

questions.question: What is pixel pitch and why does it matter?
questions.answer: Pixel pitch is the distance between LED pixels measured in millimeters. Smaller pitch (like 1.25mm) means higher resolution and sharper images, especially important for close viewing distances. Our Pro Spectrum offers ultra-fine 1.25mm pitch for crystal-clear 4K content.

questions.question: How long do Pro Spectrum displays last?
questions.answer: Our displays are rated for 100,000+ hours of operation - that's over 11 years of continuous 24/7 use. With normal business hours usage, you can expect 20+ years of reliable performance.

questions.question: What resolution is available?
questions.answer: The Pro Spectrum series supports resolutions from Full HD (1080p) up to true 4K UHD (3840x2160) and beyond, depending on the configuration size. The 217" model delivers 8.3 million pixels.

questions.question: What is COB technology?
questions.answer: COB (Chip-on-Board) technology directly mounts LED chips to the PCB without individual packaging, resulting in better heat dissipation, higher reliability, wider viewing angles, and superior image quality compared to traditional SMD LEDs.

questions.question: What inputs are supported?
questions.answer: Pro Spectrum supports HDMI 2.0, DisplayPort 1.4, USB-C, and network streaming. Multiple inputs can be displayed simultaneously with picture-in-picture or multi-window layouts.

questions.question: Do you provide installation services?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer professional installation services performed by certified technicians. Installation includes mounting, calibration, and training on system operation.

questions.question: How long does installation take?
questions.answer: Most Pro Spectrum installations can be completed in 2-4 hours for standard configurations. Larger or custom installations may require 1-2 days.

questions.question: What are the power requirements?
questions.answer: Power requirements vary by display size. A typical 217" system requires approximately 2.5kW peak power and benefits from a dedicated 20A circuit. We provide detailed electrical specifications during the planning phase.

questions.question: What structural support is needed?
questions.answer: The wall or mounting structure must support the total weight of the display. Our 217" system weighs approximately 450 lbs. We provide engineering specifications and can recommend structural reinforcement if needed.

questions.question: What warranty do you offer?
questions.answer: Pro Spectrum includes a comprehensive 4-year warranty covering all components, labor, and on-site service. Extended warranty options are available for up to 7 years of coverage.

questions.question: How do I get technical support?
questions.answer: Our support team is available via phone, email, and live chat during business hours. Emergency support is available 24/7 for critical issues. Lifetime technical support is included with every purchase.

questions.question: Do you offer on-site support?
questions.answer: Yes, on-site support is included in your warranty. For issues that cannot be resolved remotely, we dispatch a technician to your location, typically within 24-48 hours.

questions.question: Are spare parts included?
questions.answer: Yes, every Pro Spectrum system includes 5% spare modules at no additional cost, allowing immediate replacement if any module needs service.

questions.question: How long does shipping take?
questions.answer: Standard delivery is 2-3 weeks for in-stock configurations. Custom configurations may require 4-6 weeks. Expedited shipping is available for urgent projects.

questions.question: Do you ship internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide. International shipping times and costs vary by destination. We handle all customs documentation and can arrange local installation partners.

questions.question: How is the product packaged?
questions.answer: All products are carefully packaged in custom flight cases with foam protection. Each cabinet is individually wrapped and secured to prevent damage during transit.

questions.question: Is shipping insured?
questions.answer: Yes, all shipments include full insurance coverage. In the rare event of shipping damage, we provide immediate replacement at no cost.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), bank wire transfers, ACH payments, and purchase orders from qualified businesses.

questions.question: Do you offer financing?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer flexible financing options including 12, 24, 36, and 60-month terms for qualified customers. Apply during checkout or contact our sales team for details.

questions.question: Is a deposit required?
questions.answer: A 50% deposit is required for custom orders. Standard configurations can be purchased with credit card at checkout with no deposit required.

questions.question: Do you offer leasing options?
questions.answer: Yes, leasing is available through our financing partners, allowing you to preserve capital while enjoying the latest LED technology.

questions.question: Do you offer reseller programs?
questions.answer: Yes, we have partnership programs for AV integrators, resellers, and dealers. Partners receive special pricing, training, marketing support, and priority technical assistance.

questions.question: Can I become a Brightlink dealer?
questions.answer: We welcome qualified dealers to join our network. Requirements include AV industry experience and a commitment to customer service. Contact our partnership team to apply.

questions.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
questions.answer: Yes, volume pricing is available for multi-unit orders and ongoing partnerships. Contact our sales team for a custom quote based on your requirements.

questions.question: Do you work with government and education?
questions.answer: Yes, we are registered on GSA Schedule and accept purchase orders from government agencies and educational institutions. Special pricing is available for qualifying organizations.
